divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the phone outside of my shop... when I noticed in the sky from LenoirCity, TN --3E toward Oak Ridge, TN a very strange craft floating diagonal toward the ground-- it was rectangular in shape and did not appear to behave as any normalaircraft I have witnessed before... I told my friend on the phone about what Iwas seeing and watched it for a good 30 seconds or so.. and before I knew it, ithad disappeared... I live on top of a hill and have a great view of the sky...and the more I think about it... it was truly and odd experience....
Summary: BULL STEAM PLANT OBLONG RECTANGULAR TWICE
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lenoir City
There were no other sightings in Lenoir City on or around November 30th 2002
